faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: What types of emotions can be recognized?
faq.a1: We recognize the 6 basic emotions (joy, sadness, anger, surprise, fear, disgust) and neutral expressions, among various facial expressions.
faq.a2: Accuracy varies depending on individual emotion recognition skills, but averages around 70-80%. You can improve through practice.
faq.a3: Scores are based on correct answers out of 10 questions, with grades: 9-10 (Master), 6-8 (Expert), 3-5 (Rookie), 0-2 (Novice).
faq.a4: We don't collect any personal information except for nicknames, which are only used for displaying results.
faq.q5: Can I use this on mobile?
faq.a5: Yes, the app is optimized for all devices including mobile, tablet, and desktop.
